history.content:
If you did well in Data 100, academic interning is a great way of becoming part of the course staff, helping the next batch of students achieve mastery, and solidifying your own understanding of the course material.

Please fill out this form if you're interested in becoming an Academic Intern for Data 100 during the Summer 2020 semester! We're looking for students at UC Berkeley who have the potential to become tutors and UGSIs in future semesters.

Application Deadline: Friday 6/12/2020 at 11:59 PM

The weekly responsibilities of an academic intern include:
- 2 hour of preparation (e.g. doing weekly assignments ahead of time, consulting with the (U)GSI, etc)
- 3 hours of assisting in office hours
- 1 hour of reflection, pedagogy practice, AI meetings once every week

Thank you for your interest in academic interning! If you have any questions, followup below or send me an email at kagarwal2@berkeley.edu .
history.subject: Apply to be a Data 100 Academic Intern for Summer 2020!
